about_the_game:
Jaki's Wacky Adventure is a lighthearted, action-packed, cartoony RPG shooter

Play as Jaki, a clever ninja fox, in this diverse 2.5d RPG shooter. As a powerful ninja, wield your shuriken with deadly accuracy against bugs, beasts and robots as you dodge enemy fire and avoid dangerous hazards. Your path is perilous as you chase an escaped killer all the way to Chillgrave Keep. Beat your best score and become the best ninja in the land.

Game Features


Battle Bugs, Beasts & Robots
You must travel dangerous lands on your way to Chillgrave Keep. Along the way, you will encounter numerous deadly foes. Enemies can be tricky - so beware!


Discover Rare Items
Explore locations to find valuable rare items which can be used to improve your skills.


Explore Strange Lands - Discover Hidden Locations
Discover hidden locations and surprising characters as you travel from Eureka, through Toon Town all the way to deadly Chillgrave Keep as you pursue an escaped killer.

Solve Challenging Problems
Some quests have twists and turns. Be prepared to always be surprised in this action-packed adventure.
"I'm dying to press that shiny red button!' (quest available with purchase of full game)


Craft Powerful Potions
Collect unique plants and find rare crystals. Craft powerful potions to restore health or increase damage.

Meet interesting characters
During your journey, you will meet interesting characters. Meet Einstein in Eureka and help him with his garden. Speak with the cute & lovable residents of Toon Town as you solve a murder and restore peace to their quaint little town. Complete their missions to gain valuable resources that ensure your survival.


Manage your resources
Along your perilous journey, take time to explore and discover valuable items to improve your skills and chances of survival. Buy, Sell & Craft items that restore your health or increase damage.


Beat your best score to become the best Ninja in the land!

You will always be surprised in this diverse wacky adventure!

name: Jaki's Wacky Adventure Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 16:9. Not compatible with ultra wide screen, optional windowed mode provided

short_description: Jaki’s Wacky Adventure is an action-packed, cartoony 2.5d RPG shooter. Wield shuriken with deadly accuracy as you battle bugs, beasts & robots. Explore strange lands. Discover hidden locations & rare items that improve your skills. Craft powerful potions. Can you become the best ninja in the land?
